laboratory_examinations.findings: Moderate hiatal hernia, wall thickening and mild surrounding fat stranding of the mid sigmoid colon, 3.1 x 2.0 x 1.6 cm pericolonic abscess, extensive diverticulosis throughout the entire colon.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: There is wall thickening and mild surrounding fat stranding of the mid sigmoid colon compatible with known diverticulitis, unchanged since prior study.
